title: For Sale/Trade:  Colt ar-22 22lr 22 w/ 30 round mag, quad rail, & choice of scope
postcontent:
This is my Colt 22 lr long rifle ar style rifle with adjustable stock, quad rail, and 30 round mag.  It will also come with your choice of scope.   It has a BSA 4 power cross hair on it now (have the box), a Walther 55 illuminated cross (lnib), or a primary arms red dot.  All have the mounts.  Good shooter... a lot of fun... rips through 30 as fast as you can squeeze.  Loves CCI, Federal Blue, and the tactical 22... I would rather trade than sell, but put a value around $500.

Trades I'm interested in would be a really really nice 22lr in bolt action with scope for some highly accurate dogging, a 5.56/.223 bolt action with scope for the same, a good 12 or 20 gauge o/u or sxs (preferably 24-26") for my son to use for clay and birds, or maybe a stainless 7 shot 357 Taurus Tracker 4".  Feel free to throw something else out there too... never know... worst case is I would respond with a polite thank you no.

title: For Sale:  Norwegian Colt. .45 1941 German Occupation, with extras
location: Lakes Region/ Bristol, New Hampshire, United States
postcontent:
Very unusual collector's package.  This is the Norwegian Model 1914 (copy of the 1911 made under license from Colt), complete and functional, with matching serial numbers.  It comes with four original magazines with loops, plus the Norwegian issue leather holster and triple magazine pouch.
This pistol was made in 1941, in the early part of the German occupation of Norway.  It was owned by the same guy, an old friend of mine, since the late 1960's.  As a collector's item, they don't get much better than this one.  Magazines alone are worth over $100. each and the holster/pouch are scarce and expensive.

title: For Sale:  BRAVERMAN - STINGER "PEN-GUN"
location: INWOOD, WEST VIRGINIA 25428, Martinsburg, West Virginia
postcontent:
FOR SALE: BRAVERMAN - STINGER "PEN-GUN"

This is a truly unique and collectable piece. Made in the '90s, this is a fully legal, ATF approved "Pen Gun". This gun was allowed by the ATF because it has to be converted to a "Gun Shape" in order to fire it.

This is a one shot gun that even has a safety to prevent it from firing prematurely. Machined entirely from stainless steel bar-stock, this is a remarkably solid, well made and durable gun.

It come complete with two barrels. One for .25 ACP and one for .17 HMR. The barrel includes the chamber for the round.

These were only made from about 1992 to about 1997. They were revived from about 2002 to 2004. Since then there have not been any new guns made. 

This is an incredibly well made and fun gun to shoot.

We are asking $395 for the Stinger complete with both barrels and the soft case you see in the pics.

This item are available for pickup in Inwood, West Virginia:
10 miles north of Winchester VA,
10 miles south of Martinsburg, WV
10 miles west of Charlestown, WV

title: For Sale/Trade:  Winchester model 97 12 gauge, take down model 30" bbl (Mfg: 1906)
postcontent:
For sale or trade is this Winchester take down model 1897 12 gauge shotgun. It was designed by John Browning and features an exposed hammer design. It was produced from 1897 until the late 1950's with over 1,000,000 made. This is a takedown model in original configuration. The shotgun functions as intended (it shoots, the action cycles, etc.). Here is what I know about this 107 year old gun:

The receiver is a "C" revision, built in November 1906. The stock is original (with the round knob), but was modified at some point to increase length of pull. This is good for a taller/larger shooter. The stock is free from cracks or water damage, and has an attached rubber butt pad (slightly collapsed from being stored). The action is smooth and all parts function as intended. The chamber is designed for 2 3/4" shells (NOT 3" magnums).

The Barrel and Magazine tube were built in July 1906. The barrel is the original unmodified 30" version with a brass bead up front. The bore is clean, and the forcing cone is still intact. The pump slide is of the 3-screw variety, and is free from cracks or major signs of wear.

The finish is worn, leaving a rustic browned patina on the exposed metal. THERE IS NO PITTING on the surface of this gun. The 97's I've seen in local stores recently are all pitted and etched, and they are asking $500+. The stock LOP modification could be easily covered by a leather wrap (common in the old west). This shotgun is SASS/CAS approved. This would make an excellent CAS/SASS shotgun with a few modifications.

Price has been updated since listing based on condition compared to local inventory and condition. The long barrel makes picture taking somewhat difficult.

The muzzle is threaded 5/8-24 and includes an AAC 51-tooth BLACKOUT™ flash suppressor with the complete upper. A Knight’s Armament free-floating URX III helps maintain accuracy while providing for the mounting of accessories. The bolt carrier group’s nickel boron (Ni-B) UCT EXO coating has a very high hardness and lower friction than either chrome or nickel teflon. There is also a base layer of high-phosphorous electroless nickel that ensures the extreme corrosion protection that is absent from other Nickel Boron carriers that use a single, thinner layer. The bolt itself is Carpenter 158® phosphated shot-peened steel to ensure precise dimensions with no concerns for hydrogen embrittlement in the critical lug area. A special green o-ring that is tested to not bind even at -40 degrees F is standard. The extractor spring is made from premium ultra-strong wire and is a low fatigue design to ensure the longest possible life. The extractor pin made from 300 ksi S2 tool steel - not the much lower strength S7 more commonly used. Finally, a properly-staked carrier-key with Permatex® gasket-seal compound ensures no gas leakage. The trigger is a Geissele for great feel and reliability, and the stock and pistol grip by MagPul Industries. One magazine is included. Optics, mounts, and silencer are not included. The recommended optional sound suppressor is the AAC 762-SDN-6™, which provides an average of 39.3 dB reduction with subsonic ammunition.

The AAC 7.62-SDN-6 is a compact fast-attach sound and flash suppressor for 7.62x51mm and 300 AAC BLACKOUT (7.62x35mm) weapons. It is 1.25” shorter than the 762-SD and features a fully welded all-Inconel® baffle stack and front end cap to maximize durability on select fire 7.62mm SBRs. The 762-SDN-6 also functions as a superb multi-caliber suppressor for multiple hosts, providing excellent performance on 7.62 NATO, 300 AAC, 6.8 SPC, 6.5, and 5.56mm NATO. When employed on a 300 AAC BLACKOUT, the overall SPL of 126 dB with subsonic ammo is quieter than the 9mm HK MP5-SD.

Caliber:7.62 NATO, 300 BLK Weight:20.0 oz Length:7.66" Length added:6.10" Diameter:1.5" Finish:Gun-Kote™ Sound Reduction:25dB 7.62 NATO, 39dB 300BLK Mount:51T Ratchet Mount

ThermaBlock combined with our external hinge design, eliminates gaps where heat from a fire can enter the safe and damage your prized possessions. The thickness of steel used in the body is vital. Heavier gauge steel flexes less when heated, limiting distortion that lets heat in through gaps in broken welds and around the door frame. Speaking of welds, Browning ProSteel continuously weld every seam – not spot weld like some of the competition for added resistance to heat-related flex. Even the door hinge design matters. All of these little touches add up to big gains in fire and heat resistance and go a long way towards protecting your most valuable possessions. BROWNING PROSTEEL PRO SERIES CLASSIC GUN SAFE

Classic safes offer essential fire and security features, plus new Cantilever Modular Shelving that will give you almost unlimited organization potential for your guns and valuables. Oversized MAX Locking Bolts and End Bolts resist pry attack better than round bolts. The versatile DPX Storage System includes a Quick Access Barrel Rack for extra storage. The beautiful exterior finish, subtle graphics and chrome trim pieces add class to any room in your home.

MAX PRY-STOP LOCKING BOLTS

MAX Locking Bolts offer up to twelve times more bolt surface area than regular round bolts and four times the strength. Pry-Stop Corner Bolts or End Bolts add additional pry resistance in the vulnerable corners. 

FORCE DEFLECTOR LOCKING SYSTEM

The Force Deflector Locking System (U.S. patent #7,665,405) prevents bolt or handle forces from reaching the lock by using a rotating cam device. It prevents energy transfer to the lock better than most systems used in the safe industry.

DUO-FORMED DOOR

The best safe door Browning ProSteel offers is made from multiple layers of steel formed together to provide superior strength, pry resistance, and attack protection. Full second panel for outstanding strength. The door face is 1 5/16" thick.

HARDENED PIN LOCK PROTECTION

The heart of a safe's securty is its lock, and that's why all Pro Series safes feature Hardened Pin Lock Protection. The lock is protected by two 1/4" hardened steel plates and features four 1/4" hardened steel pins designed to deflect or break drill bits during a drilling attack.

NEW CANTILEVERED SHELVING

Quickly and easily adjust the shelving to meet individual storage needs. Barrel racks can be adjusted at various heights to accomodate long guns, as well as shorter carbine models. The cantilevered design eliminates the need for a vertical shelf support to add extra interior space.

DPX STORAGE SYSTEM

Includes a rack on the back of the door to store long guns and make them easier to access. Pouches and pockets organize other valuables.

 Will consider trade for HI Cap 9mm like Beretta 92.. 1911 in 45ACP or 9MM, .357 Revolver.

MAY CONSIDER OTHER TRADES OF EQUAL VALUE

Recoil pad is mounted on stock. Includes the Stock metal butt plate which will shorten the length of pull.

http://www.greatwestgunsmithing.com/index.htm

Below info from Greatwest Gunsmithing site.

Package B consists of a trigger job, receiver bedding, recoil buffer, reduced gas port bushing set and barrel work.

Trigger Job - trigger pull weight is reduced and creep/takeup are reduced for a cleaner breaking trigger and faster shot times. Triggers average 3.5 pounds to 4 pounds pull weight. 

Receiver Bedding - a glove tight fit is achieved with epoxy bedding and added metals for increased durability between the stock and receiver. This tightened fit will help reduce fliers and stringing. Receiver and stock will disassemble easily for maintenance chores.

Recoil Buffer -hand cut neoprene rubber buffer will reduce the shock of operating rod to receiver impact. 

Reduced Gas Port Bushings - one mid sized bushing is installed.

Barrel Work - .Barrel has been shortened to 16” with the end threaded. OEM Ruger flash hider added.

title: For Sale:  Ace Original Skeleton stock & Stamped Universal Receiver Block
postcontent:
(AKFX) ACE Original Skeleton Stock
ACE Original Skeleton Stock. End cap and butt are machined from solid aluminum billet, oxide blasted and hard anodized. Top bar and center brace are turned from the super strong engineered polymer Delrin. This stock is the strongest and highest quality skeleton stock available. Includes choice of .5” or 1.0” curved, rubber recoil pad. This ACE exclusive is available in three lengths.    This is the medium length stock! Butt pad adds an extra inch or two.

(AKRBU) Ace AK Stamped Universal Receiver Block
For all common stamped receiver AK’s. Such as Chinese Type 56 and MAK 90 (square cut receivers only), Romanian SAR, Hungarian, Russian/ Siaga, Egyptian Maadi. Length extends 1.535” ‘from the back edge of receiver. AKRBU is drilled and tapped in two places to allow the stock to be mounted higher for use with optical sights. Includes a 1 1/4” sling mount which can be mounted on the left or right of the rifle. Weight 180g (6.42 oz).

This setup is perfect if you want to give your AK a new look without any permanent modifications or chopping off your tang. It's very easy to install and fits any straight cut stamped receiver. I only had this mounted for a week or so. Light scuff marks on inside of receiver block from mouthing but once its mounted it can't be seen, other than that its in perfect condition. Mix top-notch security, fire protection, and appearance with excellent value and you have the Deluxe. The Force Deflector Locking System (U.S. patent #7,665,405) prevents bolt or handle forces from reaching the lock by using a rotating cam device. It prevents energy transfer to the lock better than most systems used in the safe industry.

DUO-FORMED DOOR

The best safe door Browning ProSteel offers is made from multiple layers of steel formed together to provide superior strength, pry resistance, and attack protection. Full second panel for outstanding strength. The door face is 1 5/16" thick.

The heart of a safe's securty is its lock, and that's why all Pro Series safes feature Hardened Pin Lock Protection. The lock is protected by two 1/4" hardened steel plates and features four 1/4" hardened steel pins designed to deflect or break drill bits during a drilling attack.

AXIS ADJUSTABLE SHELVING

Multiple shelf styles are available and can be moved to allow small and large items to fit in the safe and take up minimum space.

DPX STORAGE SYSTEM

Includes a rack on the back of the door to store long guns and make them easier to access. Pouches and pockets organize other valuables.

DPX SCOPE SAVER

With the Scope Saver, long guns with optics now fit on the DPX rack without taking up space inside the safe body. The optics are also protected from the bumpsand dings of guns going into and out of the safe.

ThermaBlock combined with Browning ProSteel's external hinge design, eliminates gaps where heat from a fire can enter the safe and damage your prized possessions. The thickness of steel used in the body is vital. Heavier gauge steel flexes less when heated, limiting distortion that lets heat in through gaps in broken welds and around the door frame.  Speaking of welds, Browning ProSteel continuously weld every seam – not spot weld like some of the competition for added resistance to heat-related flex. Even the door hinge design matters. All of these little touches add up to big gains in fire and heat resistance and go a long way towards protecting your most valuable possessions. When heat builds and flames roar, ThermaBlock ensures that your valuables are well protected.  MAX PRY-STOP LOCKING BOLTS MAX Locking Bolts offer up to twelve times more bolt surface area than regular round bolts and four times the strength. Pry-Stop Corner Bolts or End Bolts add additional pry resistance in the vulnerable corners. Browning ProSteel designed most of their Locking Systems utilize a cam and linkage system that diverts pounding and prying forces away from the lock.  MAX PRY-STOP CORNER BOLTS Innovative long bolts extend diagonally from the corners of the door to protect against pry attack at the vulnerable corner areas.  UNI-FORCE LOCKING SYSTEM Robust cam locks and a multiple diversion bar system divert pressure from reaching the lock.  OMNIBARRIER LOCK PROTECTION A carefully engineered structure of steel hard plate and steell components designed to protect the safe lock from drill, punch, and push attacks.  DPX SCOPE SAVERS Found exclusively on Browning ProSteel safes, the Scope Saver keeps your rifle scopes protected and ready for use.  AXIS ADJUSTABLE SHELVING Multiple shelf styles are available and can be moved to allow small and large items to fit in the safe and take up minimum space.  DUO-FORMED DOOR The best safe door Browning ProSteel offers is made from multiple layers of steel formed together to provide superior strength, pry resistance and attack protection. Full second panel for outstanding strength. The door face is 1 (5/16)" thick.  ELECTRICAL OUTLET A 110V outlet allows electrical accessories to be added without taking apart power cords.  GRADE VI INTERIOR/LED LIGHTING A fragrant cedar interior adds a rich quality to the safe. Interior LED lighting along the door frame makes locating items inside a safe much easier.  AXIS DRAWER AND MULTIPURPOSE INSERT The Axis Drawer mounts beneath an Axis Steel Shelf and includes a Multipurpose Insert that keeps small items organized, easy to locate, and protected.  AXIS FILE BOX Important documents may be irreplaceable and need to be easy to find. Keep track of them in the convenient File Box.  BROWNING PRO SERIES PINNACLE 43 DIMENSIONS Exterior DImensions (HXWXD): 60"x46"x27" Cubic feet: 43 Weight: 1,440 lbs Locking bolts: 14 Gun capacity: 43 total (22/33+10) SECURITY FEATURES Body thickness: (3/16)" Steel Door type/thickness: 1(11/16)" duo-formed Locking system: gear drive Locking bolt size: 4"x1", MAX Locking bolts side coverage: 4 sides Pry-stop bolts: 4 pry-stop MAX corner bolts Inner plate specification: full (1/4)" plate Lock: S&G mechanical or electronic Lock Protection Features: 2 hard plates, (1/4)" thick Reinforced door frame: 4-sided, full reinforcement FIRE PROTECTION FEATURES Insulation thickness- door: 2 (3/8)" Insulation thickness-body: 3(1/8)" Insulation thickness-ceiling: 2(1/2)" Fire seal: Triple-fin palusol Fire rating, NEW ThermaBlock: 1750F/120 Minutes CONVENIENCE FEATURES 180 degree hinges, LED lighting, electrical outlet, raised floor Storage solution: axis shelving, DPX with Quick Access Barrel Rack & Scope Saver DPX Handgun: 2 pouches, 5 hooks Axis Accessories Included: Drawer w/ multipurpose Insert, File Box, 5-Gun Pistol Rack
